Topic.Title: The "increase the minimum wage" argument is intellectually weak and a progressive canard

Message.Msg: I cringe when the libs say a family can't live on minimum wage. Indeed they can't. Minimum wage is not meant to be a livable wage. It's entry level for teens mostly. Those making min. wage usually don't stay there. As usual the libs have demagogued it and low information voters believe min. wage should be a livable wage.

Message.Title: gop convention workers paid below min wage (gop:they whine about the 47% , but they make sure people are paid too little to owe income tax)
Message.Msg: (good old gop.. they whine about the "47%" and they whine about food stamps WHILE they politic to make SURE the min wage stays much less than it was in 1968, which mean millions of full time adults, the majority of those on the min wage, will likely need foodstamps and make too little to owe any income tax) TAMPA, Fla. -- During these past four days at the RNC convention, janitors have worked around the clock picking up after delegates, conservative stars like Ann Coulter and Rep. Allen West (R-Fla.), and the thousands of reporters in cavernous filing rooms. And many are doing so making less than minimum wage...............................

Message.Title: FYI most min wage earners ARE NOT the very young or students.

Topic.Title: Retired Walmart Greeters Get Minimum Wage

Message.Msg: first you pub liars say, min wage workers are kids, now you say they are geezers.... well nothing but lies from you....... Less than 6% of all min wage workers are 60 and above....... and 80% are 20 and above....... the avg age is about 35. I know you think honest work like being a cook or washing dishes or janitorial is worthless and the people deserve nothing for it... but you are a #$%$, and most people disagree with you......and sure..... paying a janitor the same min wage as in 1968, which $10.42 is needed now to buy the same as the $1.60 of 1968... would ruin the economy and make the rich poorer and mabe even make the rich move to the cayman islands....... like it did in 1968.

Message.Title: Let's be clear on unemployment stats......And delucks is full of crapola
Message.Msg: 61.5% of all workers making the minimum wage or less ar between the ages of 16-29. 50% are between the ages of 16-24. 3.7 million workers (only about 2.9% of the workforce) make minimum wage or less, and this INCLUDES jobs that pay tips The median age of a minimum wage or less earner is 24 years old (see data at U.S. Census Bureau site) 62% Of those under 25 are enrolled is a school of some sort 79% of those under 25 are working part time jobs while 54% of those over 25 are working part time jobs Using relatively basic math, the average cannot possibly be anywhere near 35 ---- closer to A normalized 28 or so Anyway, you get the gist of it ---- delucks is again lying to everyone.

Topic.Title: Let's be clear on unemployment stats......And delucks is full of crapola

Message.Msg: what do you hope to achieve by such lies?

Message.Title: honest people can see min wage numbers here: Characteristics of Minimum Wage Workers: 2011
Message.Msg: (and the fact is most min wage workers are over age 20, and not students) Labor Force Statistics from the Current Population Survey Characteristics of Minimum Wage Workers: 2011 Table 7. Employed wage and salary workers paid hourly rates with earnings at or below the prevailing Federal minimum wage by age and sex, 2011 annual averages total number of minimum wage workers 3,829,000 20 to 24 years 997,000 25 years and over 1,933,000 so 2,930,000 min wage workers are 20 years or older, so as i said 80% of min wage workers are 20 or older per bls data, 2011 this data is also true and from the bls: 1. the avg age of min wage workers is about 35 2. 80% are over age 20. ... 3. 25% are over age 40, 4. 68% are full time... 5...about a third are married you whine about food stamps and you whine if anyone suggest restoring the min wage to the buying power of what it was in 1968.... the $1.60 and hr then is $10.42 in 2012 dollars....... and ntm your ususal limbot lies. next time, before you start up with the lies go to Characteristics of Minimum Wage Workers: 2011 at the bls
